name: memorialize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to create a memorial (= an object such as a statue) to honour a famous person or event: A local artist was commissioned by the community to memorialize the war dead.
to make people remember a person or event, or to show that you remember them: The legendary Ray Charles was memorialized in the story "The Genius Of Soul: Hail And Farewell To Ray Charles."
